name: veho-technologies-software-engineer
title: Software Engineer
jobSummary: Veho Technologies is seeking a Software Engineer to join our team in building innovative solutions for the logistics industry. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development and a passion for creating scalable and efficient systems.
hardSkills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++
Experience with web development frameworks and tools
Knowledge of database systems and SQL
Understanding of software development methodologies and best practices
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure
softSkills: Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Attention to detail and commitment to quality
Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies

candidateProfile.experience: 2+ years of experience in software development, preferably in a startup or agile environment.
candidateProfile.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
qualities: Ability to think critically and creatively
Strong work ethic and dedication to achieving results

responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain software applications and systems
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement new features
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and issues
experience: Experience with version control systems like Git
Familiarity with continuous integration and deployment pipelines
Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Knowledge of containerization tools like Docker
